description.narrative: BY 2018, TIMELY, EFFECTIVE AND COORDINATED SUPPORT IS PROVIDED FOR HIGH QUALITY PROGRAMMING, IMPLEMENTATION AND REPORTING IN PURSUIT OF RESULTS FOR THE CHILD PROTECTION PROGRAMME, which contributes to Child Protection â€“ General, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: By 2018, children and adolescents, particularly the most vulnerable, are better protected against abuse, violence and exploitation.

description.narrative: The Child Protection section faced a shortage of staff with the reassignment of the CP Specialist-Social Welfare since end of July,2018.It is expected that the new CPMP will be tailorded in line with the outcome/outputs planned | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019
